slide_outlines.slide_focus: 1980'ler, Türkiye'nin siyasi, ekonomik ve sosyal yapısında köklü değişimlerin yaşandığı kritik bir on yıl olmuştur.
12 Eylül 1980 askeri darbesi, Türkiye'nin siyasi yapısını derinden etkileyerek yeni bir anayasa ve siyasi düzen getirmiştir.
Turgut Özal'ın başbakanlığı döneminde uygulanan liberal ekonomi politikaları, Türkiye'nin dünya ekonomisiyle entegrasyonunu hızlandırmıştır.
1980'ler, Türkiye'de popüler kültürün yükselişi, medyanın çeşitlenmesi ve tüketim alışkanlıklarının değişimiyle karakterize edilmiştir.
1980'lerde yaşanan değişimler, Türkiye'nin siyasi, ekonomik ve sosyal yapısını şekillendirerek günümüze kadar uzanan etkilere sahip olmuştur.

validation_feedback.feedback: Outline has a clear introduction and conclusion, each slide covers a distinct concept, and there is a logical flow connecting political, economic, and cultural themes. The content is balanced with specific focuses, and the overall structure suggests good time management feasibility for the presentation.

slide_outlines.slide_focus: 1980'ler, Türkiye'nin siyasi, ekonomik ve sosyal yapısında köklü değişimlerin yaşandığı kritik bir on yıl olmuştur.

Turgut Özal'ın başbakanlığı döneminde uygulanan liberal ekonomi politikaları, Türkiye'nin dünya ekonomisiyle entegrasyonunu hızlandırmıştır.
1980'ler, Türkiye'de popüler kültürün yükselişi, medyanın çeşitlenmesi ve tüketim alışkanlıklarının değişimiyle karakterize edilmiştir.
1980'lerde yaşanan değişimler, Türkiye'nin siyasi, ekonomik ve sosyal yapısını şekillendirerek günümüze kadar uzanan etkilere sahip olmuştur.

data.slide_onscreen_text:
1980'ler Türkiyesi: Bir Dönüm Noktası

  • Siyasal Yeniden Yapılanma
  • Ekonomik Dönüşüm
  • Sosyal Değişim Dinamikleri
data.slide_voiceover_text: 1980'ler Türkiye'nin tarihinde kritik bir dönemdir. Bu on yıl, ülkenin siyasal, ekonomik ve sosyal dokusunda köklü değişimlerin yaşandığı bir süreç olarak karşımıza çıkmaktadır. Askeri darbe sonrası başlayan yeniden yapılanma süreci, Türkiye'nin gelecek on yıllarını şekillendiren önemli bir dönüm noktası olmuştur.
data.slide_image_prompt: A symbolic representation of 1980s Turkey, showing a split image with three distinct sections: on the left, a military parade representing political restructuring; in the center, an industrial landscape symbolizing economic transformation; on the right, a diverse group of people representing social change. Use a muted color palette of browns, grays, and deep blues. Employ a historical documentary photography style with a slightly desaturated look, capturing the essence of societal transition. The image should convey a sense of complexity and transformation, with sharp contrasts between different elements representing the multifaceted changes of the decade.

data.feedback: The content is generally well-structured and coherent, but there are areas for improvement to achieve full marks. The onscreen text, voiceover, and image prompt are aligned in their message about the transformative nature of 1980s Turkey. However, the onscreen text could be more specific to match the level of detail in the voiceover. Consider adding brief subpoints under each main point to provide more context. The voiceover text is informative but could benefit from a more explicit connection to the three main points listed on screen. The image prompt is detailed and relevant, but it could be enhanced by including elements that directly represent the 'dönüm noktası' (turning point) mentioned in the title. To improve technical quality, ensure consistent use of Turkish characters (e.g., 'ı' instead of 'i' in some words) in all text elements.

data.slide_onscreen_text:
1980'ler Türkiyesi: Bir Dönüm Noktası

  • Siyasal Yeniden Yapılanma
    • Askeri darbe ve yeni anayasa
  • Ekonomik Dönüşüm
    • Serbest piyasa ekonomisine geçiş
  • Sosyal Değişim Dinamikleri
    • Kültürel çeşitlilik ve kentleşme
data.slide_voiceover_text: 1980'ler, Türkiye'nin tarihinde kritik bir dönüm noktasıdır. Bu on yıl, ülkenin siyasal, ekonomik ve sosyal dokusunda köklü değişimlerin yaşandığı bir süreç olarak karşımıza çıkar. Siyasal yeniden yapılanma, askeri darbe sonrası yeni anayasayla başlamıştır. Ekonomik dönüşüm, serbest piyasa ekonomisine geçişle kendini göstermiştir. Sosyal değişim dinamikleri ise, artan kültürel çeşitlilik ve hızlanan kentleşmeyle şekillenmiştir. Bu üç ana eksendeki değişimler, Türkiye'nin gelecek on yıllarını derinden etkilemiştir.
data.slide_image_prompt: A symbolic representation of 1980s Turkey as a turning point, showing a triptych image with three interconnected sections: On the left, a scene of military presence transitioning into a civilian government, symbolizing political restructuring. In the center, an economic graph arrow breaking through traditional barriers, representing the shift to a free market economy. On the right, a cityscape evolving from traditional to modern, with diverse groups of people, symbolizing social and cultural change. At the center, place a large, stylized arrow or road forking into these three directions, emphasizing the 'turning point' concept. Use a color palette transitioning from muted browns and grays to more vibrant blues and greens, suggesting progress and change. Employ a mix of realistic and abstract elements in a historical documentary style, capturing the essence of societal transformation in 1980s Turkey.

data.feedback: The slide content is excellent and meets all the criteria for a high-quality presentation. The onscreen text, voiceover, and image prompt are well-aligned and coherent. The message is clear, concise, and delivers appropriate detail. The content flows logically, presenting the three main aspects of change in 1980s Turkey. The multimedia design is well-balanced, with concise onscreen text and a comprehensive voiceover. The image prompt is detailed and relevant, enhancing the overall presentation. The technical quality is high, with correct HTML markup and consistent, professional language throughout. To achieve absolute perfection, consider adding a brief mention of specific examples or key figures in the voiceover to further illustrate each point of change.

data.slide_onscreen_text:
12 Eylül 1980 Darbesi: Türkiye'de Siyasal Dönüşüm

  • Askeri Müdahale ve Anayasal Değişim
  • Siyasi Yapıda Köklü Dönüşüm
  • Demokratik Sistemin Yeniden Yapılandırılması
data.slide_voiceover_text: 12 Eylül 1980 askeri darbesi, Türkiye'nin siyasi tarihinde dönüm noktası niteliğinde bir olaydır. Bu darbe, ülkenin siyasi yapısını tamamen değiştirerek yeni bir anayasal düzen getirmiş, siyasi partilerin faaliyetlerini durdurmuş ve toplumsal yaşamı derinden etkilemiştir. Generaller tarafından gerçekleştirilen bu müdahale, Türkiye'nin demokratik sistemini yeniden şekillendirirken, aynı zamanda siyasi katılımı ve ifade özgürlüğünü önemli ölçüde sınırlandırmıştır.
data.slide_image_prompt: A dramatic historical illustration depicting the 12 September 1980 military coup in Turkey. Show military tanks rolling through the streets of Ankara, with soldiers in formal military uniforms standing nearby. Use a muted color palette of grays and browns to convey the serious historical moment. In the background, include symbolic elements representing the political transformation, such as a partially torn Turkish flag or broken governmental buildings. The image should have a documentary-style realism, capturing the tension and gravity of the military intervention. Composition should be wide-angle, showing the scale and impact of the military takeover on urban landscape.

data.feedback:
The slide content is well-structured and coherent, effectively conveying the key points about the 1980 military coup in Turkey. The onscreen text, voiceover, and image prompt are well-aligned and complement each other. However, to achieve perfection, consider the following minor improvements:

1. Content Coherence: Add a brief mention of the 'new constitutional order' in the onscreen text to better align with the voiceover.

2. Multimedia Design: The voiceover could briefly touch on the 'Democratic System Restructuring' mentioned in the onscreen text for complete alignment.

3. Technical Quality: The image prompt is detailed and relevant, but consider adding a specific element to represent the 'new constitutional order' mentioned in the slide focus.

data.slide_onscreen_text:
Özal Dönemi: Ekonomik Liberalleşme Dönüşümü

  • Dünya Ekonomisiyle Entegrasyon
  • Serbest Piyasa Ekonomisi Reformları
  • Dış Ticaretin Serbestleşmesi
  • Özel Sektörün Güçlendirilmesi
data.slide_voiceover_text: Turgut Özal'ın başbakanlık döneminde Türkiye, köklü bir ekonomik dönüşüm yaşadı. Liberal politikalarla kapalı ekonomiden açık ekonomiye geçiş sağlandı. Özal, ihracata dayalı büyüme modelini benimseyerek ülkeyi dünya ekonomisiyle entegre etmeyi hedefledi. Serbest piyasa ekonomisi, özelleştirmeler ve dış ticaretin serbestleşmesi bu dönemin temel karakteristik özellikleri oldu.
data.slide_image_prompt: A split-screen vintage style illustration depicting Turkey's economic transformation in the 1980s. On one side, a traditional, closed economy scene with industrial buildings and restricted trade symbols. On the other side, a modern, open market scene with global trade routes, international business people, and dynamic economic growth indicators. Use a color palette of muted blues, browns, and yellows to represent the historical transition. Incorporate subtle 1980s graphic design elements and a slightly nostalgic, documentary-like visual aesthetic.

data.feedback: The slide content is excellent and coherent. The onscreen text, voiceover, and image prompt are well-aligned and effectively convey the key points of the Özal era's economic liberalization. The content is informative, concise, and logically structured. The image prompt enhances the message by visually representing the economic transformation. To further improve, consider adding a specific date or year range for Özal's tenure as Prime Minister in the onscreen text for additional context.

Use a color palette of muted blues, browns, and yellows to represent the historical transition. Incorporate subtle 1980s graphic design elements and a slightly nostalgic, documentary-like visual aesthetic.

data.slide_onscreen_text:
1980'lerde Kültürel ve Sosyal Dönüşüm

  • Popüler Kültürün Yükselişi
  • Medyada Çeşitlenme
  • Tüketim Alışkanlıklarının Değişimi
  • Kentleşme ve Toplumsal Dönüşüm
data.slide_voiceover_text: 1980'ler Türkiye'si, kültürel ve sosyal açıdan son derece dinamik bir dönemdi. Bu yıllar, geleneksel toplum yapısından modern tüketim toplumuna geçişin hızlandığı bir süreç olarak karşımıza çıkıyor. Popüler kültürün yükselişi, medyanın çeşitlenmesi ve tüketim alışkanlıklarındaki köklü değişimler, toplumun her kesimini derinden etkiledi. Özellikle kentlerde yaşanan hızlı dönüşüm, sosyal yaşamın tüm dinamiklerini yeniden şekillendirdi.
data.slide_image_prompt: A vibrant, collage-style illustration capturing the essence of 1980s Turkish social transformation. Combine iconic elements like a vintage television, colorful urban street scene, fashion magazines, and people representing different social classes. Use a color palette of bright, slightly faded 1980s colors - think bold blues, oranges, and yellows. Include split-screen or overlapping imagery to represent the cultural complexity of the era. The style should be a mix of realistic and pop art, reflecting the dynamic social changes of the period. Incorporate subtle visual references to urbanization, media proliferation, and emerging consumer culture.

data.feedback:
The content is generally well-structured and informative, but there are a few areas for improvement:

1. Content Coherence (35/40):
- The alignment between onscreen text, voiceover, and image prompt is good, but the onscreen text could be more closely aligned with the voiceover content.
- Consider adding a bullet point about the transition from traditional to modern consumer society to match the voiceover.

2. Multimedia Design (28/30):
- The balance between onscreen and voiceover text is appropriate.
- The image prompt is detailed and relevant, but could benefit from more specific references to Turkish culture.

3. Technical Quality (28/30):
- The HTML markup is correct, but consider using <li> tags for better semantics.
- The language is consistent and professional.

To improve:
- Add a bullet point about the transition from traditional to modern consumer society.
- Include more specific Turkish cultural references in the image prompt.
- Use <li> tags in the HTML markup for list items.
- Consider mentioning the impact on different social classes in the onscreen text to better match the voiceover and image prompt.

data.slide_image_prompt: A vibrant, collage-style illustration capturing the essence of 1980s Turkish social transformation. Combine iconic elements like a vintage television showing popular Turkish shows, a colorful Istanbul street scene with both traditional and modern buildings, Turkish fashion magazines, and people representing different social classes in 80s Turkish attire. Use a color palette of bright, slightly faded 1980s colors - think bold blues, oranges, and yellows. Include split-screen or overlapping imagery to represent the cultural complexity of the era. The style should be a mix of realistic and pop art, reflecting the dynamic social changes of the period. Incorporate subtle visual references to urbanization, media proliferation, and emerging consumer culture, such as Turkish brand logos and advertisements from the 80s. Include elements that show the contrast between traditional Turkish lifestyle and the new modern consumer society, like a traditional tea set next to a newly introduced fast-food meal.

The onscreen text, voiceover, and image prompt are well-aligned and complement each other perfectly. The content is comprehensive, covering key aspects of the transformation such as the rise of popular culture, media diversification, changing consumption habits, and urbanization. The language is consistent and professional throughout. The image prompt is particularly strong, providing a vivid and detailed description that captures the essence of the era. To further enhance the content, consider adding a specific example or statistic in the voiceover to illustrate one of the points, such as the increase in TV ownership or a popular cultural icon of the time.

data.slide_onscreen_text:
1980'lerin Mirası: Türkiye'nin Bugününe Etkileri

  • Siyasi Dönüşüm: Askeri Rejimin Kalıcı İzleri
  • Ekonomik Yapılanma: Liberalleşme Dönemi
  • Sosyal Değişim: Kimlik ve Kültürel Dönüşüm
data.slide_voiceover_text: 1980 dönemi Türkiye'nin siyasi, ekonomik ve sosyal dokusunda köklü değişimlere neden olmuş kritik bir zaman dilimi. Askeri darbe sonrası başlayan süreç, ülkenin tüm kurumlarını ve toplumsal yapısını derinden etkilemiştir. Siyasette merkeziyetçi yaklaşımlar, ekonomide dışa açılma politikaları ve sosyal yaşamda köklü dönüşümler, bugünün Türkiye'sinin temellerini oluşturmuştur.
data.slide_image_prompt: A split-screen historical illustration showing Turkey in the 1980s and modern Turkey, with symbolic elements representing political, economic, and social transformation. On one side, military parade and economic charts from the 1980s, on the other side modern cityscape and technological symbols. Use a muted color palette of blues and grays, with a photorealistic style that emphasizes historical continuity and change. Include subtle transitional elements connecting both sides of the image to represent the lasting legacy of the 1980s.

data.feedback:
The content is generally well-structured and informative, but there are a few areas for improvement:

1. Content Coherence (35/40):
- The alignment between onscreen text, voiceover, and image prompt is good, but the voiceover could more explicitly connect to the bullet points.
- The message is clear, but the voiceover could be more specific about the lasting effects.

2. Multimedia Design (28/30):
- The balance between onscreen and voiceover text is appropriate.
- The onscreen text is concise and well-structured.
- The voiceover provides good context but could be more detailed on specific effects.
- The image prompt is relevant and enhances the content effectively.

3. Technical Quality (28/30):
- The HTML markup is correct, but consider adding more semantic elements for better structure.
- The image prompt is clear and specific, but could include more modern elements to emphasize the 'lasting effects'.
- Language is consistent and professional throughout.

To improve:
1. Expand the voiceover to directly address each bullet point mentioned in the onscreen text.
2. Include more specific examples of how the 1980s have influenced modern Turkey in the voiceover.
3. Enhance the image prompt by including more contemporary elements to better illustrate the lasting impact.
4. Consider using additional HTML elements like <section> or <article> to improve semantic structure.

data.slide_onscreen_text:
1980'lerin Mirası: Türkiye'nin Bugününe Etkileri

  • Siyasi Dönüşüm: Askeri Rejimin Kalıcı İzleri
  • Ekonomik Yapılanma: Liberalleşme Dönemi
  • Sosyal Değişim: Kimlik ve Kültürel Dönüşüm
data.slide_voiceover_text: 1980 dönemi, Türkiye'nin siyasi, ekonomik ve sosyal dokusunda köklü değişimlere neden olmuş kritik bir zaman dilimi. Askeri darbe sonrası başlayan süreç, ülkenin tüm kurumlarını ve toplumsal yapısını derinden etkilemiştir. Siyasi alanda, askeri rejimin kalıcı izleri hala hissedilmekte; örneğin, güçlü merkezi yönetim anlayışı ve siyasi partiler yasası gibi düzenlemeler günümüz siyasetini şekillendiriyor. Ekonomide, 1980'lerde başlayan liberalleşme dönemi, Türkiye'yi küresel pazarlara açarak ihracat odaklı bir ekonomi haline getirdi ve bugünkü ekonomik yapının temellerini attı. Sosyal alanda ise, kimlik politikaları ve kültürel dönüşüm, modern Türkiye'nin çokkültürlü yapısını ve kent-kır ayrımındaki değişimleri beraberinde getirdi. Bu dönemin etkileri, günümüz Türkiye'sinin siyasi, ekonomik ve sosyal dinamiklerinde hala belirgin şekilde gözlemlenebilmektedir.
data.slide_image_prompt: Create a split-screen historical illustration showing Turkey in the 1980s and modern Turkey, with symbolic elements representing political, economic, and social transformation. On the left side, depict a military parade, economic charts, and traditional social scenes from the 1980s. On the right side, show a modern cityscape with skyscrapers, technological symbols like smartphones and computers, and diverse social groups representing modern Turkish society. Use a muted color palette of blues and grays for the 1980s side, transitioning to vibrant colors for the modern side. Include subtle transitional elements connecting both sides, such as a fading constitution document, evolving currency symbols, and changing fashion styles. Add specific elements like a modern parliament building, international trade symbols, and social media icons to emphasize the lasting impact of 1980s policies on contemporary Turkey. Use a photorealistic style that emphasizes historical continuity and change.

data.feedback:
The content is well-structured and informative, but there are areas for improvement to achieve full marks:

1. Content Coherence (35/40):
- The alignment between onscreen text, voiceover, and image prompt is generally good, but the voiceover could be more tightly linked to the specific bullet points on screen.
- The message is clear, but the voiceover provides more detail than necessary for a concise slide presentation.

2. Multimedia Design (28/30):
- The balance between onscreen and voiceover text is slightly off. The onscreen text is appropriately concise, but the voiceover is too detailed for a single slide.
- The image prompt is relevant and enhances the content well.

3. Technical Quality (29/30):
- HTML markup is correctly used.
- The image prompt is clear and specific, providing an excellent visualization of the content.
- Language is consistent and professional throughout.
- Minor improvement: Consider adding more specific dates or figures in the voiceover to anchor the information.

Overall, the content is of high quality but needs minor refinements to achieve a perfect score. Focus on tightening the voiceover text to match the bullet points more closely and consider adding more specific data points to enhance the information's impact.

data.slide_onscreen_text:
1980'lerin Mirası: Türkiye'nin Bugününe Etkileri

  • Siyasi Dönüşüm: Askeri Rejimin Kalıcı İzleri
  • Ekonomik Yapılanma: Liberalleşme Dönemi
  • Sosyal Değişim: Kimlik ve Kültürel Dönüşüm
data.slide_voiceover_text: 1980'ler, Türkiye'nin geleceğini şekillendiren kritik bir dönemdi. Siyasi alanda, 12 Eylül 1980 darbesi sonrası oluşturulan 1982 Anayasası, güçlü merkezi yönetim anlayışını pekiştirdi. Ekonomide, 24 Ocak 1980 kararlarıyla başlayan liberalleşme süreci, Türkiye'yi ihracat odaklı bir ekonomiye dönüştürdü. 1983'te ihracat 5,7 milyar dolardan, 1989'da 11,6 milyar dolara yükseldi. Sosyal alanda ise, 1983'te özel TV ve radyo yayınlarına izin verilmesi, kültürel çeşitliliği artırdı. Bu değişimler, günümüz Türkiye'sinin siyasi, ekonomik ve sosyal yapısını hala etkilemektedir.
data.slide_image_prompt: Create a split-screen historical illustration showing Turkey in the 1980s and modern Turkey, with symbolic elements representing political, economic, and social transformation. On the left side, depict a military parade, economic charts showing rising exports, and traditional social scenes from the 1980s. On the right side, show a modern cityscape with skyscrapers, technological symbols like smartphones and computers, and diverse social groups representing modern Turkish society. Use a muted color palette of blues and grays for the 1980s side, transitioning to vibrant colors for the modern side. Include transitional elements connecting both sides, such as the 1982 Constitution fading into a modern parliament building, evolving currency symbols from the old Turkish Lira to the New Turkish Lira, and changing media landscape from traditional TV to social media platforms. Use a photorealistic style that emphasizes historical continuity and change, with clear labels for key years (1980, 1983, 1989) on the left and '2023' on the right to anchor the timeline.

data.feedback:
The content is generally well-structured and informative, but there are a few areas for improvement:

1. Content Coherence (35/40):
- The alignment between onscreen text, voiceover, and image prompt is good, but the voiceover could be more closely tied to the specific bullet points on screen.
- The message is clear, but the voiceover could be more concise to match the brevity of the onscreen text.

2. Multimedia Design (27/30):
- The balance between onscreen and voiceover text is good, with concise bullet points and a more detailed voiceover.
- The image prompt is relevant and enhances the content well.
- Consider adding a few more specific details to the onscreen text to better mirror the voiceover content.

3. Technical Quality (28/30):
- The HTML markup is correct, but consider adding classes for better styling control.
- The image prompt is clear and specific, but could benefit from mentioning the split-screen concept in the onscreen text.
- Ensure consistency in date formats (e.g., '1980'ler' vs '1980s').

To improve:
1. Add brief explanations to each bullet point on screen to better match the voiceover content.
2. Include a reference to the visual split-screen concept in the onscreen text.
3. Standardize date formats throughout the presentation.
4. Consider adding classes to HTML elements for improved styling options.

data.slide_onscreen_text:
1980'lerin Mirası: Türkiye'nin Bugününe Etkileri

  • Siyasi Dönüşüm: Askeri Rejimin Kalıcı İzleri
    1982 Anayasası ve güçlü merkezi yönetim
  • Ekonomik Yapılanma: Liberalleşme Dönemi
    İhracat odaklı ekonomi, 1983-1989 arası büyüme
  • Sosyal Değişim: Kimlik ve Kültürel Dönüşüm
    Özel medya ve artan kültürel çeşitlilik

Not: Görsel, 1980'ler ve günümüz Türkiye'sini karşılaştırmalı olarak göstermektedir.
data.slide_voiceover_text: 1980'ler, Türkiye'nin geleceğini şekillendiren kritik bir dönemdi. Siyasi alanda, 12 Eylül 1980 darbesi sonrası oluşturulan 1982 Anayasası, güçlü merkezi yönetim anlayışını pekiştirdi. Ekonomide, 24 Ocak 1980 kararlarıyla başlayan liberalleşme süreci, Türkiye'yi ihracat odaklı bir ekonomiye dönüştürdü. İhracat, 1983'te 5,7 milyar dolardan 1989'da 11,6 milyar dolara yükseldi. Sosyal alanda ise, 1983'te özel TV ve radyo yayınlarına izin verilmesi, kültürel çeşitliliği artırdı. Bu değişimler, günümüz Türkiye'sinin siyasi, ekonomik ve sosyal yapısını hala etkilemektedir.
data.slide_image_prompt: Create a split-screen historical illustration comparing Turkey in the 1980s and modern Turkey, with symbolic elements representing political, economic, and social transformation. On the left side, depict a military parade, economic charts showing rising exports, and traditional social scenes from the 1980s. On the right side, show a modern cityscape with skyscrapers, technological symbols like smartphones and computers, and diverse social groups representing modern Turkish society. Use a muted color palette of blues and grays for the 1980s side, transitioning to vibrant colors for the modern side. Include transitional elements connecting both sides, such as the 1982 Constitution fading into a modern parliament building, evolving currency symbols from the old Turkish Lira to the New Turkish Lira, and changing media landscape from traditional TV to social media platforms. Use a photorealistic style that emphasizes historical continuity and change, with clear labels for key years (1980, 1983, 1989) on the left and '2023' on the right to anchor the timeline.

data.feedback: The slide content is exceptionally well-crafted and coherent. The onscreen text, voiceover, and image prompt are perfectly aligned, delivering a clear and comprehensive message about the legacy of 1980s Turkey and its impact on the present. The content demonstrates excellent balance between concise onscreen text and detailed voiceover information. The image prompt is highly specific and relevant, enhancing the overall presentation. The use of HTML markup is correct, and the language is consistent and professional throughout. The slide effectively covers political, economic, and social aspects, providing a logical flow of information with appropriate level of detail. No improvements are necessary as the content meets all criteria at the highest level.

data.new_prompt: Create a split-screen historical illustration comparing Turkey in the 1980s and modern Turkey, focusing on symbolic elements representing political, economic, and social transformation. Left side (1980s): Simplified silhouettes of a military parade, minimalist economic growth chart, and traditional family scene. Right side (Modern): Stylized modern cityscape with basic skyscraper outlines, simplified tech symbols (smartphone and computer icons), and diverse group outlines representing modern society. Use a gradient color scheme transitioning from muted blues and grays (left) to vibrant oranges and reds (right). Include abstract connecting elements: fading outline of a document representing constitutional change, simplified currency symbol evolution, and media transition depicted by TV antenna morphing into a Wi-Fi symbol. Employ a minimalist, vector-like style with clean lines and shapes. Ensure high contrast and bold colors for clear visibility in presentations. Avoid any text or detailed facial features. Composition should be balanced with clear division between past and present, emphasizing the transformation theme through visual elements only.
